songs.title: Not Fade Away
songs.lyrics:
I'm gonna tell you how it's gonna be
You're gonna give your love to me
I wanna love you night and day
You know my loving won't fade away
You know my love, not fade away

My love is bigger than a Cadillac
I try to show you and you drive me back
Your love for me got to be real
For you to know just how I feel
A love for real, not fade away
Yes, a love for real, not fade away

I'm gonna tell you how it's gonna be
You're gonna give your love to me
A love to last more than one day
'Cause a love for real won't fade away
A love that's love and not fade away

I'm gonna show you how it's gonna be
You're gonna give your love to me
A love to last more than one day
'Cause a love is love, not fade away
A love is love, not fade away
'Cause a love is love, not fade away

A love is love, not fade away
Love is love, love is love
Love is love, not fade away
Love is love, not, love is love, not
Love is love, not fade away
